title: Cheesecake Ingredients
text: 1 1/2 cups graham cracker crumbs (170g), 2 Tablespoons sugar, 1 Tablespoon brown sugar (can substitute white), 7 Tablespoons butter melted, 32 oz cream cheese² softened to room temperature (910g), 1 cup sugar 200g, ⅔ cups sour cream 160g, 1 ½ teaspoons vanilla extract, ⅛ teaspoon salt, 4 large eggs room temperature, lightly beaten
